Insurance Open Claims Component

Open Claims Child Component
You are here: SALESFORCE HELP > INSURANCE > Insurance Open Claims Component

Show your Policyholder site users a snapshot of their open claims, and link them to additional information about the claims with the Insurance Open Claims component.

This component is composed of a FlexCard and the LWC compiled from the FlexCard:

FlexCard: insAccountClaims_nds
LWC: cfInsAccountClaims_nds

Label: Insurance Account Claims Newport

What Your Users Can Do on this Component

Policyholder site users can click the name of the claim to go to the claim details page.

Open Claims Child Component
Use the Insurance Open Claims Child component to show your Policyholder site users a snapshot of their open claims, and link them to additional information about the claims. It's a child component that sits inside of the Insurance Open Claims container component.
title: Insurance Open Claims Component in Salesforce
